Service Details: - Volunteer run organization offers support to those caring for children, of any age, with mental health and eating disorders- Also provides a home-away-from-home with free breakfast to those with children admitted to Kelowna General Hospital
How to Apply: Please call our office for additional information or to apply
Languages: English - All ; French - Michel and Sonya, by appointment only ; German - Christa and Sonya ; Greek - Sofia, by appointment only ; Interpretive Services ; Czech
